text: Split Image is a 1982 Canadian American drama movie directed by Ted Kotcheff and starring Michael O'Keefe, Karen Allen, Peter Fonda, James Woods, Elizabeth Ashley, Brian Dennehy, Ronnie Scribner. It was distributed by Orion Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1982 drama movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ted Kotcheff
title: Split Image (movie)
